###### HOUSE DURRANDON (id = dynn_Durrandon)
############################
### Ours is the Fury
###
Durrandon_1 = {
	name = Durran # Canon, AKA: Durran Godsgrief, Durran I, built Storm's End
	dynasty = dynn_Durrandon

	martial = 18
	diplomacy = 15
	stewardship = 20
	learning = 15
	intrigue = 15

	religion = storm_god
	culture = first_man

	trait = education_martial_4
	trait = intellect_good_3
	trait = physique_good_2
	trait = bossy

	give_nickname = nick_godsgrief

	disallow_random_traits = yes

	3.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
	}
	19.1.1 = {
		trait = arrogant
		trait = ambitious
		trait = wrathful
		trait = stubborn
	}
	28.1.1 = { add_spouse = Durrandon_rs_1 }
	90.1.1 = { death = yes }
}
Durrandon_rs_1 = {
	name = Elenei # Canon, supposedly the daughter to the god of the sea and the goddess of the wind

	intrigue = 10

	religion = storm_god
	culture = first_man

	trait = beauty_good_2
	trait = physique_good_2

	3.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
	}
	19.1.1 = { trait = lifestyle_mystic_3_history }
	90.1.1 = { death = yes }
}

		trait = lazy

###### HOUSE BARATHEON (id = dynn_Baratheon)
############################
### Ours is the Fury
###
Baratheon_14 = {
	name = Orys # Canon, THE Orys Baratheon, a lord, rumoured half-brother of Aegon the Conqueror
	dynasty = dynn_Baratheon
	dna = Baratheon_14

	martial = 13
	diplomacy = 8
	intrigue = 4
	stewardship = 10
	learning = 6

	religion = valyrian_pan_freehold
	culture = westerosi_valyrian

	father = Targaryen_26

	trait = bastard_founder # Caution: succession error

	trait = education_martial_3
	trait = strong
	trait = authoritative
	trait = brave
	trait = diligent
	trait = rowdy

	disallow_random_traits = yes

	7978.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = has_scripted_appearance
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
		add_character_flag = unlegitimize_on_load
		effect = {
			dynasty:dynn_Baratheon = { set_coa = dynn_Baratheon_Old }
		}
	}
	7988.1.1 = {
		effect = { add_trait = just }
	}
	7994.1.1 = { trait = education_martial_prowess_2 }
	7996.1.1 = { employer = Targaryen_27 } # Aegon I Targaryen
	7998.1.1 = {
		effect = { # Hand of the King
			agot_appoint_as_councillor_for_castle_history_effect = {
				CASTLE = title:c_dragonstone
				POSITION = councillor_castellan
			}
		}
	}
	7999.4.1 = {
		effect = { # Hand of the King
			agot_appoint_as_councillor_for_castle_history_effect = {
				CASTLE = title:e_the_iron_throne
				POSITION = councillor_castellan
			}
		}
	}
	7999.9.10 = { # The Last Storm
		effect = { add_prestige_level = 1 }
	}
	7999.9.15 = {
		add_spouse = Durrandon_88 # Argella Durrandon
		effect = {
			remove_character_flag = unlegitimize_on_load
			dynasty:dynn_Baratheon = { set_coa = dynn_Baratheon }
			remove_claim = title:d_dragonstone
			remove_claim = title:c_dragonstone
		}
	}
	8001.6.1 = {
		trait = knight # Knighted at Aegon took Oldtown.
		religion = fots_seven
		culture = stormlander
	}
	8004.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			title:c_wyl.holder = { # Edwyle Wyl
				imprison = {
					target = ROOT
					type = dungeon
				}
			}
		}
	}
	8007.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			release_from_prison = yes
			remove_trait = just # Four Traits Rule
		}
		trait = one_handed
		give_nickname = nick_one_hand_historical
		trait = irritable # Was said to have become crabbed and bitter
		trait = vengeful
	}
	8038.4.3 = { # Died of wounds during Vulture Hunt
		trait = wounded_1
		death = { death_reason = death_wounded_1 }
	}
}

Connington_27 = {
	name = Roy # Canon, AKA: Red Roy Connington, a lord, friend of princess Saera
	dynasty = dynn_Connington
	dna = Connington_27

	religion = fots_seven
	culture = stormlander
	sexuality = heterosexual

	father = Connington_26
	mother = Redfort_20_B

	trait = education_martial_1
	trait = arrogant
	trait = brave
	trait = gregarious
	trait = rowdy

	disallow_random_traits = yes

	8067.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
		add_character_flag = sexuality_ensure_not_homosexual
		add_character_flag = sexuality_ensure_not_asexual
	}
	8080.1.1 = {
		trait = lustful
		trait = lifestyle_blademaster
		give_nickname = nick_red
	}
	8082.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			agot_safe_lover_history_effect = {
				TARGET = character:Moore_24 # Perianne Moore
			}
			agot_safe_lover_history_effect = {
				TARGET = character:Turnberry_18 # Alys Turnberry
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Moore_24 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Moore_24 # Perianne Moore
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Turnberry_18 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Turnberry_18 # Alys Turnberry
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Beesbury_22 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Beesbury_22 # Braxton Beesbury
			}
		}
	}
	8083.1.1 = { trait = knight }
	8084.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { character:Turnberry_18 = { is_alive = yes } }
				remove_relation_lover = character:Turnberry_18 # Alys Turnberry
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Moore_24 = { is_alive = yes } }
				remove_relation_lover = character:Moore_24 # Perianne Moore
			}
		}
	}
	8093.6.1 = { death = { death_reason = death_murder } } # Stabbed to death in a brothel
}

###### HOUSE STAEDMON (id = dynn_Staedmon)
############################

		}

		effect = {
			agot_lc_kingsguard_char_history_effect = { # Previous Lord Commander: Harrold Westerling

		}
